name: COUNT
baseQuery:
SELECT ?parent WHERE 
	{ 
		?parent a test:Person.
		?parent test:hasChild ?child .
		?child test:age ?age .
		FILTER(?age >= 18)
	}
	GROUP BY ?parent
	HAVING (COUNT(?child) >= 2)
mapping:
BASE <http://www.symbiote-h2020.eu/ontology/semanticmapping/testModel#>

	RULE 
		CONDITION CLASS :Person 
			:hasChild TYPE CLASS ANY 
				AGGREGATION COUNT >=2 
					:age VALUE >=18  
		PRODUCTION CLASS :PersonWithTwoAdultChildren
